title: Frost Daggerfish
summaries: The Frost Daggerfish is a consumable ranged weapon that can pierce up to two enemies (hitting 3). Up to 100 can be fished from lakes in Snow biomes at a time. When thrown, the Frost Daggerfish acts similarly to Shurikens or Throwing Knives, flying in an arc and then spinning to the ground.
The <linked>Angler</linked> uses Frost Daggerfish to defend himself against nearby enemies.

statistics.Sell: 16 CC
